article.headline: Texas St. 82, Prairie View 68
article.story: SAN MARCOS, Texas -- Brent Benson came off the bench to score 16 points, including four 3-pointers, to lead Texas State to a 82-68 victory over Prairie View on Sunday. Benson made his first 3-pointer early in the first-half and kept shooting the rest of the way. Brandon Bush scored 14 for the Bobcats (4-6), Cameron Johnson scored 13 and John Rybak added 11. The Bobcats made only 37 percent of their shots, but were 10-of-23 from 3-point range. Christopher Jones was the high scorer for Prairie View (3-9) with 17 points. Darnell Hugee joined him as the only other Panther to score in double figures with 14 points.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
